CustomField.formula:
CASE (
VALUE(CASE( Relationship__c , "Excellent", "2", "Good", "1", "Neutral", "0", "Poor", "-1", "Hostile", "-2", "0") )
*
VALUE (CASE( Influence__c , "Strong", "3", "Moderate", "2", "Weak", "1", "0") )
,
6, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt97","3 Up Arrows") , 4, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt98","2 Up Arrows") , 3, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt98","2 Up Arrows") , 2, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt99","1 Up Arrow") , 1, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt99","1 Up Arrow") , 0, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt9A","Neutral Arrow") , -1, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt9B","1 Down Arrow") , -2, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt9B","1 Down Arrow") , -3, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt9C","2 Down Arrows") , -4, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt9C","2 Down Arrows") , -6, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt9D","3 Down Arrows") , IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt9A","Neutral Arrow")
)
CustomField.label: Advocacy
